I think the Classics are $70 locally. They're my favorite for running.
My boss banned Vibram FiveFingers and insists on calling them toe socks. :)
I'd call 'em gorilla toes myself! I thought about trying a pair for running...but not sure if $100 to just try 'em out is worthwhile...
No reason given. Not "professional looking" is what I assume.
Start running barefoot really short distances. Once you get that down and decide you like it, VFFs can offer a little protection without too much support.
It took me about 2 months to break myself into running with them. I've got a pair of Sprints fro running, and the KSOTrek for everyday wear.
I am wearing shoes....
